title: Max Carey pre-rookie 1910 South Bend Broncos postcard
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: Max Carey pre-rookie 1910 South Bend Broncos postcard
posts.post_content:
1910 South Bend Broncos postcard with Max Carey pre-rookie.  He is on the back row third from the left.

 

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=298889&d=1513362447[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=298891&d=1513362468[/IMG]
Ouch. That is one ugly group of dudes!
Thanks Jim, our postcard section is going to be fantastic.
